original_title: Murder in Ypsilanti: Keith Morrison Investigates
overview: Tammy Niver, 24, disappeared in 1993. In 2018, Martha McGeorge Agnew was murdered. A journalist connected the dots between the cases and investigators arrested the suspect, who received two life sentences for his crimes in Ypsilanti, MI.
title: Murder in Ypsilanti: Keith Morrison Investigates
